import React from 'react' import { Card , CardBody } from 'reactstrap' import {Link } from 'react-router-dom' const TourCard = ({tour}) => { const {id , title, city, photo , featured , avgRating, reviews}= tour return (
Featured
{city} {avgRating} ({reviews.length})
{title}
) }; export default TourCard
